sentences.en: After making a simple relief base, the mesh was subdivided to receive the Noise modifier.
sentences.cn: 在制作了简单的雕塑基础之后, 网格被子细分(subdivide)后用来接受Noise修改器.

sentences.en: Over time, developers subdivided the land.
sentences.cn: 开发商们渐渐地把这块土地进行了再分割。

sentences.en: Subdivide Multi Fractal - As above, but new vertices are randomly displaced within a user - defined range.
sentences.cn: 不规则多次细分 - 与上一样, 但它是在用户定制的范围内随机置换细分.

sentences.en: Subdivide the diagonal section at the back - left side of the triangle with one diagonal - back parting.
sentences.cn: 在和对角线的 - 背面的三角形的背面留下的边细分对角线的区段离别的.

sentences.en: Subdivide the fringe section with a diagonal - left parting.
sentences.cn: 以对角线 - 左边分别细分边缘区段.

sentences.en: Subdivide the section with a diagonal - back parting.
sentences.cn: 以对角线 - 背面分别细分区段.

sentences.en: Subdivide with a horizontal parting below the occipital.
sentences.cn: 在后头骨下面以水平线分别细分.

sentences.en: The actual practice is divide accounting unIt'stepstep until individual wells and then to subdivide them.
sentences.cn: 研究了油田生产中成本控制问题,将成本的核算单位详细划分到单井,并将其细化分解.

sentences.en: The house was subdivided into apartments.
sentences.cn: 房子又被分割成几个套间。

sentences.en: You can use sales organizations to subdivide markets into regions.
sentences.cn: 用销售组织将市场细分为区域.

words.tran_cn: 细分；分部；供出卖而分成的小块土地

trans.tran_en: to divide into smaller parts something that is already divided
